page.title: 08Leisure Activities
page.content: In my spare time I like to go down to the river. In the springtime I can fish for small creatures to go in my pond. I catch tadpoles and silver diving beetles. I don't enjoy riding around Avebury on my bike because there are too many tourists. There are many clubs at school like chess, clay, sports,gymnastics, computer and music. In the summer we can swim in the school swimming pool.At sports club we sometimes play games like rounders and tip and run. I play tennis at home up against the wall. In Avebury there is a recreation field where we can play football,cricket and most other games. There are swings and a slide to play on as well. Avebury has a social centre used by various organisations like Brownies,Guides,Over Sixties, and Playgroup. Meetings of various kinds take place there also.
